name: .IBD File Extension
summary: Learn about .IBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an IBD file in MySQL (cross-platform) if you are using the InnoDB database engine. For example, you can use a backup IBD file to restore the table it contains if your current copy of the table has become corrupted or been deleted. For more information on how to use a backup IBD file to restore a MySQL table, refer to MySQL's official documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
